00020 #include <stdio.h>
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 #include <errno.h>
00023 #include <string.h>
00024 #include "libphonefirewall.h" 
00025 
00026 #define BLACKLIST_PREFIX "db/blacklist_"
00027 #define WHITELIST_PREFIX "db/whitelist_"
00028 #define FILENAME_SIZE 256
00029 
00030 static char* DELIM = "::";
00031 
00032 char filename[FILENAME_SIZE];
00033 
00034 int set_filename(char *prefix, int country_code, int area_code) {
00035         snprintf(filename, sizeof(filename), "%s%d-%d", prefix, country_code, area_code);
00036         if ( NULL != filename ) return 0;
00037         else return -ENOENT;
00038 }
00039 
00040 int add_blacklist_entry(int country_code, int area_code, unsigned long long number, char *name, char *reason, int priority) {
00041         if ( 0 != set_filename(BLACKLIST_PREFIX, country_code, area_code) ||
00042                 NULL != check_blacklist_entry(country_code, area_code, number, PRIO_ALL) ||
00043                 priority < PRIO_ALL ) return -1;
00044 
00045 
00046         FILE *file;
00047 
00048         if ( NULL == (file = fopen(filename, "a+"))) return -EINVAL;
00049         fprintf(file, "%d%2s%lld%2s%d%2s%d%2s%256s%2s%256s\n", priority, DELIM, number, DELIM, country_code, DELIM, area_code, DELIM, name, DELIM, reason);
00050 
00051         fflush(file);
00052         fclose(file);
00053 
00054         return 0;
00055 }
00056 
00057 int add_whitelist_entry(int country_code, int area_code, unsigned long long number, char *name, char *reason, int priority) {
00058         if ( 0 != set_filename(WHITELIST_PREFIX, country_code, area_code) ||
00059                 NULL != check_whitelist_entry(country_code, area_code, number, PRIO_ALL) || 
00060                 priority < PRIO_ALL ) return -1;
00061 
00062         FILE *file;
00063 
00064         if ( NULL == (file = fopen(filename, "a+"))) return -EINVAL;
00065         fprintf(file, "%d%2s%lld%2s%d%2s%d%2s%s%2s%s\n", priority, DELIM, number, DELIM, country_code, DELIM, area_code, DELIM, name, DELIM, reason);
00066         
00067         fflush(file);
00068         fclose(file);
00069 
00070         return 0;
00071 }
00072 
00073 int rm_blacklist_entry (unsigned long long number) {
00074         return -ENOSYS;
00075 }
00076 
00077 int rm_whitelist_entry (unsigned long long number) {
00078         return -ENOSYS;
00079 }
00080 
00081 char *check_blacklist_entry(int country_code, int area_code, unsigned long long number, int priority) {
00082         if ( 0 != set_filename(BLACKLIST_PREFIX, country_code, area_code) ) return NULL;
00083 
00084         FILE *file;
00085 
00086         if ( NULL == (file = fopen(filename, "a+"))) return NULL;
00087 
00088         char line[MAX_LINE_LENGTH];
00089         char *substr = NULL; 
00090         char strnumber[MAX_LINE_LENGTH];
00091         char *hit = NULL;
00092         int tmppriority;
00093 
00094         snprintf(strnumber, sizeof(strnumber), "%lld", number);
00095 
00096         while ( !feof(file) ) {
00097                 if( 0 != fgets(line, sizeof(line), file) ) {
00098                         substr = strtok(line, DELIM);
00099                         tmppriority = atoi(substr);
00100                         substr = strtok(NULL, DELIM);
00101                         if ( PRIO_ALL == priority ) {
00102                                 if ( 0 == strcmp(substr, strnumber)  ) {
00103                                         hit = substr;
00104                                         fclose(file);
00105                                         return hit;
00106                                 }
00107                         } else if ( tmppriority >= priority ) {
00108                                 if ( 0 == strcmp(substr, strnumber)  ) {
00109                                         hit = substr;
00110                                         fclose(file);
00111                                         return hit;
00112                                 }
00113                         }
00114                 } 
00115         }
00116 
00117         fclose(file);
00118         return hit;
00119 }
00120 
00121 char *check_whitelist_entry(int country_code, int area_code, unsigned long long number, int priority) {
00122         if ( 0 != set_filename(WHITELIST_PREFIX, country_code, area_code) ) return NULL;
00123 
00124         FILE *file;
00125 
00126         if ( NULL == (file = fopen(filename, "a+"))) return NULL;
00127

00131         char *hit = NULL;

00133 
00134         snprintf(strnumber, sizeof(strnumber), "%lld", number);
00135

00139                         tmppriority = atoi(substr);

00141                         if ( PRIO_ALL == priority ) {

00143                                         hit = substr;
00144                                         fclose(file);

00151                                         return hit;

00153                         }
00154                 }
